docs.lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett made the rounds at a couple of television studios Wednesday, offering his insights on topics ranging from the state of the economy to his Goldman Sachs holdings.

headline.main: Talking Shop, Buffett Pooh-Poohs Deflation Fears

docs.abstract: Warren E. Buffett made the rounds at the television studios Wednesday, offering his insights on topics ranging from the state of the economy to his Goldman Sachs holdings.
